Once in this state, can't get off the source page

There is little chance I can fix it unless you provide more concrete steps. 
Obviously you were working in the source view and tried to switch to one of the 
form pages. Unfortunately, I added some code in ManifestEditor.java, so the 
line number is useless.

The problem has been traced to out-of-sync resources. PDE will now refuse to 
open a manifest editor on an out-of-sync manifest file. Refresh from local will 
be needed to edit that file.
